title: Zombieland Saga (Dub)
alternative_title: Zombie Land Saga, ゾンビランドサガ
description: Zombieland Saga (Japanese: ゾンビランドサガ Hepburn: Zonbirando Saga) is an upcoming anime television series. The series is produced by Cygames in collaboration with Avex Pictures, and animated by studio MAPPA. The series will premiere on October 4, 2018.
